title: My Initiatives
subtitle: Open an initiative to manage documents, projects, and membership.
selectGuildDescription: Switch into a guild to view its initiatives and memberships.
loadError: Unable to load initiatives right now.
noInitiativesDescription: You’re not part of any initiatives in this guild. Check back after an admin invites you or create one if you have permissions.

createDialog.title: Create initiative
createDialog.description: Give it a name, optional description, and color to organize projects.
createDialog.colorHint: This accent appears on projects tied to the initiative.
createDialog.createError: Unable to create initiative right now.

detail.notFoundDescription: The initiative you’re looking for doesn’t exist or you no longer have access.
detail.noAccess: You do not have access to any features in this initiative. Contact an initiative manager for assistance.

settings.title: Initiative settings
settings.subtitle: Update details, manage members and roles, and control dangerous actions.
settings.notFoundDescription: The initiative you’re looking for doesn’t exist or you no longer have access.
settings.permissionRequiredDescription: Only guild admins and initiative project managers can manage initiative settings.
settings.detailsDescription: Rename, describe, or recolor this initiative.
settings.editPermissionNote: Only guild admins or initiative project managers can edit details.
settings.updateError: Unable to update initiative right now.
settings.membersDescription: Initiative project managers and guild admins can manage membership.
settings.addMemberError: Unable to add member right now.
settings.unableToLoadMembers: Unable to load potential members right now.
settings.removeMemberError: Unable to remove member right now.
settings.roleUpdateError: Unable to update role right now.
settings.rolesDescription: Configure what each role can do within this initiative. Project Manager permissions are locked to prevent accidental lockouts.
settings.dangerDescription: Deleting an initiative removes all of its projects, tasks, and documents.
settings.defaultCannotDelete: The default initiative cannot be deleted.
settings.contactAdmin: Contact a guild admin ({{adminLabel}}) to delete this initiative.
settings.deleteError: Unable to delete initiative right now.
settings.deleteConfirmDescription: Deleting <bold>{{name}}</bold> will permanently remove all projects, tasks, and documents within it. This cannot be undone.
settings.createRoleDescription: Add a new role with custom permissions for this initiative.
settings.roleInternalNameHint: Lowercase, no spaces. Used internally for identification.
settings.deleteRoleDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the role "{{roleName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
settings.renameRoleDescription: Change the display name for the "{{roleName}}" role.
settings.removeMemberDescription: Are you sure you want to remove <bold>{{name}}</bold> from this initiative?
settings.removeMemberWarning: This will also remove their explicit access to all projects and documents in this initiative.
settings.roleNameRequired: Name and display name are required.
